body: mutation {updateproduct (product: {id: "${id}", name: "testing2", sku: "abc12345", ship: true, shipping_delay:3601,  fulfillment_provider:"1bd805d0-0062-499b-ae28-00c5d1b827ba", default_price:9.99, dynamic_pricing: { min: 8.99, max: 10.99 }}) { id, name, sku, ship, shipping_delay, default_price, dynamic_pricing { min, max } fulfillment_provider { id, name, provider { name } }, created_at, updated_at } }
